content: corner chain space ch2 single_crochet in same chain space *single_crochet in each st across to next corner single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in corner chain space repeat around omitting the last corner stitches close with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet cut yarn and weave in all ends 19 single_crochet per side 1 corner ch2 space design by © koernerklaus 2019 no sale no uploading on social media no publishing of excerpts from the pattern copyright is up to me
